name: Joe ApfelbaumevyAI
what_you_do: Joe Apfelbaum is the CEO of evyAI, a LinkedIn AI assistant that helps users save time and enhance their LinkedIn activity through AI-driven tools. He also provides business development training and marketing strategies through Ajax Union.
who_you_serve: Joe serves B2B clients, particularly those looking to enhance their LinkedIn presence and leverage AI for business development and marketing.
seeking: Sales leaders at companies with 5-999 SDR and BDR teams.
offering: Speaking engagements, training events, and access to a community of engaged LinkedIn users.
current_projects: Launching evyAI, hosting posting parties and training events.
bio: 29,999 connections, 54,618 followers, published author of 5 books, professional speaker.
business_focus: Joe Apfelbaum is the CEO of evyAI, a LinkedIn AI assistant that helps users save time and enhance their LinkedIn activity through AI-driven tools. He also provides business development training and marketing strategies through Ajax Union. (B2B marketing)
